title: Virgin Punishment
description: Mindy Garcia has been a naughty girl. Father Santiago and Father Montoya have been counting down the days to Mindy's eighteenth birthday so they can give the busty virgin teen the punishment she so desperately deserves. Will Mindy's penance put her back in the fathers' good graces?The Twisted Virgin Tales series of stories may contain elements of bdsm (light spanking or bondage, and domination/submission), role-playing within May-December romances, sex toys, anal sex, multiple partners, taboo sexual partners and eighteen-year-old high school girls behaving very badly. Check out all the stories in the Twisted Virgin Tales series including Virgin Punishment, Virgin Desires, Virgin School, Virgin Secrets, and Virgin Confessions. If you like my stories check out my experimental erotic fantasy shorts (coming soon!). ~ Ella XXOOXX
author: Ella Marquis
